body:
Comment 3 by **robert.c.nix**: 
Yea, sorry, i meant to ls that

$ ls -la /usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Los_Angeles 
-rw-r--r-- 2 root root 3519 Feb 26  2006 /usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Los_Angeles

Ok, there seems to be an issue with my zoneinfo. On the system that fails:

$ echo $TZ
US/Eastern
$ date
Mon Jun 27 11:27:50 EDT 2011
$ TZ=UTC date
Mon Jun 27 15:27:50 UTC 2011
$ TZ=America/Los_Angeles date
Mon Jun 27 11:27:50 EDT 2011

What i should get is:

$ echo $TZ
US/Eastern
$ date
Mon Jun 27 11:28:12 EDT 2011
$ TZ=UTC date
Mon Jun 27 15:28:12 UTC 2011
$ TZ=America/Los_Angeles date
Mon Jun 27 08:28:12 PDT 2011
